meanings.definition: The stage in cell division when chromosomes align in the center of the cell.
meanings.sent1: During metaphases, chromosomes line up in the middle of the cell.
meanings.sent2: Metaphases are crucial for the proper distribution of genetic material.
meanings.sent3: At the metaphases party, the chromosomes always end up in the center!
meanings.sent4: In the dance of cell division, metaphases are like the grand finale.
meanings.sent5: Imagine metaphases as a synchronized dance of chromosomes in the cell center.

meanings.definition: The process of chromosomes aligning in the center of the cell during cell division.
meanings.sent1: The metaphases ensure chromosomes are perfectly aligned for division.
meanings.sent2: Cell division involves metaphases where chromosomes organize themselves.
meanings.sent3: The metaphases meeting turned into a chromosome alignment competition!
meanings.sent4: In the chaos of cell division, metaphases bring order to the chromosomes.
meanings.sent5: Visualize metaphases as the conductor orchestrating the alignment of chromosomes.
